title: Client Download speed wont go any higher than 6KBPS (Help me ! ! !)
body:
Hello,

My client refuses to download any higher than 6KBPS (With and without Peer to peer) It's been doing this for the past month.

I use an Optus internet-stick 4G (I live out in the county) It has a 35MBPS Downloadspeed on the speedtest. I can almost instantly load HD youtube videos.

Is there a way to fixing this, or will I have to drive 3 hours out of town to re-download the client

replies.body:
Hi!

I haven't got a huge amount of experience with downloading via mobile broadband, but one common trick you can use that can affect download speed, is to try a few different DNS settings.  There's a section in [this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) on our support page that walks you through how that works.

Let me know how it goes!

Cheers
Mindstar
